name: 勇士HERO
description:
game introduction

Bring you an epic adventure experience.
Your loved ones have been taken away,
The brother was killed,
Now, revenge.
Red showdown black!
A classic RPG role-playing game, I hope to bring you happiness.

Game features: You can use ↑↓←→ control character movement and space bar to investigate.
Game content: 10-20 hours of game time, grass, island, land,
battlefield. Beautiful music, beautiful avatar.
Gameplay: Classic turn-based battles, upgrade your gear, and get coins.
Investigate hidden items to get rewards.
